name: Maeander
description:
An experimental first-person puzzle game in a labyrinthine library, with an early 90s 2.5D aesthetic. The space is non-Euclidean (rooms can overlap), and every bookshelf can be interacted with to get a full-length book from Project Gutenberg (https://www.gutenberg.org)

How To Play: Spacebar to interact with levers and bookshelves.
